page.title: 11SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: Guardbridge has only a few facilities providing the locals with very basic goods. The post office/newsagent is situated on Main road. It is visited by alot of people, all year round. The sales are quite high for a population of this size. They have expanded alot since they first arrived. The T.S.B is a very small branch and no additional staff are required other than the two that work full-time. The bank is only open on a Thusday and on Friday. Most people go to Dundee for their weekly shopping as there is not alot of grocery in the post office/newsagent.
